statement.tex: %text Find the value of $k$ for which the points $A=(k, 3),\, B=(6, -2)$ and $C=(-3, 4)$ are collinear. %

step.context: %text If points $(x_1,y_1)$, $(x_2,y_2)$ and $(x_3,y_3)$ are in a straight line, is the following always true? %
%text If slope formed by $A(k, 3),\, B(6, -2)$ is equal to the slope formed by $B(6, -2)$, $C(-3, 4)$, then what is $k$? %
